publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4647 Ms Maureen Watt: Energy Price Hikesâ€”That the Parliament condemns the power companies for their latest round of price hikes and calls on ministers to intervene; notes that Scotland is an energy-rich country but recognises that many of our citizens suffer fuel poverty; calls on the Scottish Executive to expand insulation and central heating programmes throughout the country, and further calls on ministers to change planning law to ensure that all new homes reach the highest energy efficiency standards.

S2M-4647 Energy Price Hikes (lodged on 30 June 2006) Christine Grahame*, Tommy Sheridan*, Brian Adam*, Bruce Crawford*, Chris Ballance*, Helen Eadie*, Stewart Stevenson* R, Alex Neil*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4647 Energy Price Hikes (lodged on 30 June 2006) Frances Curran*
S2M-4647 Energy Price Hikes (lodged on 30 June 2006) Mr John Swinney*
S2M-4647 Energy Price Hikes (lodged on 30 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4647 Energy Price Hikes (lodged on 30 June 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*, Eleanor Scott*
